website_summaries.verdict: Using premium ingredients, a protein-rich blend, and a blend of probiotics, prebiotics, and enzymes for digestive health, Wysong is a genuinely impressive and nutritious ferret food.
pros: Chicken meal and organic chicken are the first 2 ingredients
Includes healthy chicory root, apple, and chia seed superfood ingredients
cons: An expensive ferret food, but since it utilizes fresh organic chicken in the recipe, it is to be expected

customer_reviews.title: Yummy?
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's ferret food, so I haven't tried it and likely won't. Crash the super ferret seems thrilled that he gets some. Not really sure if he's a picky eater but think he might be because he insists on eating his same brown food daily kind of like a toddler that will insist in going a year only eating chicken nuggets every day. He isn't over eating it though, as he's not getting fatter, he's the same little noodle he's always been. Crash the super ferret seems to be just quite pleased with this so I'm thinking I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ScarlettRed

customer_reviews.title: Use it as cat food and it's fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend started his 13yo cat on this stuff last year and I fought tooth and nail to avoid paying so much for so little for my own cat. I gave in, and quite honestly it's the best thing that's ever happened for my 4yo cat. He was overweight (16lbs!), sluggish, his coat was dull, his breath stunk. Since switching to this high protein food he's lost about 4 lbs, has more energy, his coat is shiny and gorgeous, and his breath is much better. His poops are nuclear but if it means he's getting more protein and no carbs like felines are supposed to get then I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: meggletron

customer_reviews.title: I had read everywhere that it was the best food, and I still don't dispute the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for 2 older ferrets after getting them at 4 years old. I had read everywhere that it was the best food, and I still don't dispute the ingredients. However, my ferrets couldn't tolerate this. I think it was too rich or something but it get them diarrhea and stinky poo. I switched to the Mazuri brand ferret food on the recommendation of my vet and it has been great. They have solid stools, the overall smell of them and their cage has dramatically decreased. You really only smell it up next to the cage.
customer_reviews.author: brittanie

customer_reviews.title: The best alternative to feeding a raw diet
customer_reviews.text: I have a ferret with Insulinoma, so having a high quality protein rich and grain free diet is important. I originally started with using Marshall ferret food when I first had ferrets, but then after one of my ferrets developed Insulinoma, I started using Evo Ferret food. However, after a couple of recalls and the seeming discontinuation of the Evo product, I did much research and found this food. My ferrets will not eat meat after many attempts, however I believe this is the best alternative available. I'm so glad I found this product and feel confident in feeding this to my ferrets to keep them healthy and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Vitoria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nutrition, You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Everything your ferret needs to get healthy and much much less fillers. All my ferret loving friends have said check the top 6 ingredients of your ferrets food and doing that with this food shows you just how valuable this food is to obligate carnivores which all ferrets are. Pay the money, it's worth it. On top of that my picky eaters took right to it. I'm curious to see how long a 5lb bag last against 5 porky ferrets.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Caused crazy diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Like that its grain free but caused crazy diarrhea my ferrets would run and sometimes not make it to the liter box poop was sooo runny everyday they seemed unhappy like their stomachs hurt. They seemed to start to get dehydrated so had no choice but to switch foods. They are gaining weight, happy and healthy now on another food now won't ever buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with ingredients
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find ferret food that does not list fruit, veggies, or pea protein within the first two lines of the ingredients. Pea protein causes stones in cats and ferrets, so I try my best to avoid feeding anything with Pea protein.. This food is rich so I mix it with Dr elsys.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: i bought this for my overweight cat
customer_reviews.text: cat food has too much grain in it, so, i got this for my overweight cat, she loved it. i mix her cat food half and half with this stuff and she seemed to be slimming down a little bit. i also used to feed this to my ferrets, when i had ferrets, they loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Warlord

customer_reviews.title: My ferrets werent thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Im not so sure why because I saw the ratings for this food on many sites and they were all good neither of my ferrets liked this food though and ate very little until I switched them. I noticed some weight loss and their bowls would seem fuller than usual.
customer_reviews.author: james Byrge

customer_reviews.title: Made my little guy sick
customer_reviews.text: I gradually introduced this food as instructed and it made my ferret sick. He had vomiting and diarrhea. I stopped giving him this food and all his symptoms cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: TS in Florida

customer_reviews.title: much better for their stomachs
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I am surprised Wysong is still selling this. This is so harsh on ferret's stomachs. If you want a high quality food go for Wysong's Digestive Support, its basically the same formula as this but is much, much better for their stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Fat healthy ferrets
customer_reviews.text: I moved over to wysong food since it has the best ratings. My ferrets have gotten fatter and their coat has become significantly better! Fluffy and super soft. Before they were slightly skinny and coat was coarse. Only bad side is poo stinks more and poo is more goopy. Which doesn't bother me. Just daily chores keeps the stench away.
customer_reviews.author: Yuly

customer_reviews.title: Best Brand For Ferrets
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best brand for ferrets on the market. I mix both variants of Wysong Epigen 90 in a bucket. I then add in small chunks of Wysong Archetype. I then add in small chunks of Wysong Dream Treats. My ferret will never get a better meal in his life.
customer_reviews.author: KKlouzal

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market for your ferret
customer_reviews.text: My ferret loves this food, I have seen a huge improvement in her coat and weight since she's been on it.. she has actually gotten more active and her poop doesn't smell that bad anymore.. By far worth the money and will definitely​ be ordering it again!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Shull

customer_reviews.title: Not the proper blend
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer of this food came with high recommendation from vets. I believe in the company and quality of ingredients they use. However I experienced what most owners have after feeding this formula to my pets, poor digestion issues and diarrhea. I will switch back to the digestive support formula.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Wysong is no ordinary food!
customer_reviews.text: The animals overall appearance after feeding this food(DIGESTIVE SUPPORT FORMULA) over time is much improved. Transitioning wasn’t as challenging as expected either. She seems to look much better than she was when we first got her. Previous owner was feeding discount generic brand cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think Wysong is one of the best foods available for ferrets
customer_reviews.text: Buddha, my ferret does very well on this, along with a mixture of the Wysong Archytype Chicken/ Rabbit/or Quail. I have read reviews that others have written about this causing diarrhea, but have not experienced it. If he did I would switch to the Wysong Digestive Support. Overall, I think Wysong is one of the best foods available for ferrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Ferrets LOVE this food!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the headline states. My ferrets love this food. It may seem expensive but after extensive research, I've found this to be the best food around to feed my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carrell

customer_reviews.title: Carpet-shark approved.
customer_reviews.text: Our Catsnakes love it. We have noticed an improvement in their coats texture and shine since switching from Zupreem. It also seems to last longer per bag. No complaints here besides maybe price. However, if you get it on auto delivery it will save you some.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Health
customer_reviews.text: A little more than I can afford to give my ferret by itself, but I mix it with the cheap stuff so her diet is at least 30% healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Mix foods to reduce diarrhea.
customer_reviews.text: This food definitely causes diarrhea. We mix it with Sheppard and Greene to decrease the runs and they still benefit from this healthy food
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Best ferret kibble
customer_reviews.text: I got my first ferret and this was the food I wanted to use since it has good reviews. My ferret loves this food. The only problem is her poop is weird. It smells better I guess but it's not as solid. The vet says it's fine though so I guess it's ok. She's been on it for about 2 or 3 months and her coat has grown in fluffy and beautiful. This food is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Jaidan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for my ferret since day 1; really like it and I'm not planning on changing brands so far...
customer_reviews.author: I. Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My ferret loves this food! Vet recommended and just what I needed to keep my little man healthy for life!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best besides raw
customer_reviews.text: The best thing on the market for ferrets. You should NOT be feeding them the normal ferret foods on shelves... The ingredients cause insulinoma. Ferrets are obligate carnivores and need the right good to not get sick and suffer.
customer_reviews.author: Monia W. Munn-schreml

customer_reviews.title: Food Quality
customer_reviews.text: My girls do pretty well with this food. Most better than any food at the pet store. My girls smell better and are happier. Be careful the makers have changed ingredients without warning in past making my girls throw up as they adjusted. Ferrets need very slow integration of food change.
customer_reviews.author: Upcyclejoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For A Ferret
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time I purchased for my Ferret. According to the label, it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: RobertH

customer_reviews.title: I like Wysong
customer_reviews.text: It is the first time trying this product. Hopefully my ferrets will learn to like. I used wysong cat food years ago when I had my first ferret and was happy with it then.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ferret loves it, he is at a healthy weight and his coat looks great
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: good food for my fur babies
customer_reviews.text: One of the best food for my ferrets that can be bought online. My ferret vet considers this in his top 5 choices of foods to feed them besides prescription.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and easy to switch
customer_reviews.text: My ferret changed to his new food really fast. As soon as his old food ran out he started eating right away. His stools are healthy and so is he.
customer_reviews.author: ChaosBornX

customer_reviews.title: Will probably upset your ferrets stomach
customer_reviews.text: While wysong is one the best brands for your ferret, this one has made every ferret of mine have diarrea! Wysong digestive support is better for the average indoor ferret
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Chomps it
customer_reviews.text: Our ferret loves it and he Runs and chomps it as soon as he smells it
customer_reviews.author: DJ2BIG

customer_reviews.title: Good Ferret food
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this food for my 2 ferrets. I’m not a food expert, but my ferrets seem to like it and haven’t gotten sick or anything while eating this. It is a bit pricy, compared to alternatives, but it also makes the ferret poop smell less horrificly.
customer_reviews.author: arkady rapoport

customer_reviews.title: High quality food- but make sure to read labeling
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT immediately switch your ferret without getting them accustomed to it first. Read the labeling in full before starting this food.
customer_reviews.author: cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't agree
customer_reviews.text: This is a great food, however, it just didn't agree with my ferrets.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Small amount at a time seems to be working it's so much better then the Marshall ferret food
customer_reviews.text: I put a handful and with my regular Marshall ferret food surprisingly they're eating it great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Mata

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful food. The protein and fat levels are perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful food. The protein and fat levels are perfect for healthy ferrets, and our 4 boys absolutely love it. Because it is such high quality, they a lot less of it than other foods, and it helps keep their stool a little firmer. Our vet is happy with this food as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah P.

customer_reviews.title: High protein and ferrets love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this ferret food my babies eat it with no problems and maintain there weight just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My mom said this food made the ferrets smell more. They seem to like it alot. I like that the ingredients are not full of junk like alot of other brands
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food
customer_reviews.text: Ferrets like it...I mix it with a couple of other foods so they get used to multiple types.
customer_reviews.author: Texasgal

customer_reviews.title: Great for giving your ferrets everything they need.
customer_reviews.text: This product has improved my ferrets over all health. I highly recommend this product! They have the highest percentage of protein then any other brand I have found!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best ferret food around. I use this to blend with other kibble and am very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McDonald

customer_reviews.title: best ferret food
customer_reviews.text: Best ferret food I have found, solid ingredients, no grain
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Bierschenk

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: My ferret has always been on a Marshall Diet his whole life. We tried to slowly introduce him to this brand and we ended up taking him to the vet because it made his stomach swell up. He’s still recovering. If you’ve only used Marshall DO NOT SWITCH TO THIS BRAND.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great food for ferrets, 1 of the highest rated ferret foods available, and my ferrets love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Pinball wizard

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Best food for carpet sharks, hands down! Always fresh and stinky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Helped my ferrets go up to their proper weights. And they love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Steve
customer_reviews.text: Great product the best i have found for my ferretts
customer_reviews.author: steveweddell

customer_reviews.title: Helps them get healthy
customer_reviews.text: My ferret has gained weight and her fur looks healthier and its nearly been a month. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Jade-Lynn Chagaris

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets enjoy eating this
customer_reviews.text: Feed mixed w other high protein food and my ferrets love it great protein source for carnivores
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: I love this food!
customer_reviews.text: It is soooo hard to find this food which is hands down the best dry food on the market for ferrets. I add some freeze dried raw cat food in with this food and have seen an amazing turnaround with my ferret baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: My ferret starts pooping watery in the beginning. Then they get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Ligia Elena Gonzalez Valbuena

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: I mix this in with my ferret's food and he seems to like it. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Terrible stool results from this
customer_reviews.text: Gave terrible diarrhea to my little ones for over three weeks. Absolutely awful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Y.

customer_reviews.title: have my boy the runs
customer_reviews.text: did a 15 day intro (or attempted to), maybe even longer. didn't sit in my boys tummy right. I kept decreasing the amount i was giving him and his poop went back to normal as soon as i got down to lower than 10%
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Made my ferrets sick, but it has been known ...
customer_reviews.text: Made my ferrets sick, but it has been known to be hit or miss among the ferret community. Will try another blend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the long rats
customer_reviews.text: My weasles love it, and they're more vibrant and energetic on this than the other foods I've tried them on, if they're happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: My ferrets loved the food but their little stomachs did not.
customer_reviews.text: The diarrhea never subsided even after 3 months. We introduced it slowly as recommended but it didn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Best food!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff got your ferrets! A little exspenive but worth it for the healthy fat ferret!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good for now.
customer_reviews.text: Our ferret, Gus, loved it at first but now he seems to want something else. He still enjoys it though.
customer_reviews.author: Eri

customer_reviews.title: Good Food
customer_reviews.text: Took the little ones to get used to it. But now1 they enjoy it and there fur is coming in thicker and shinier than ever before.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Ferrets.
customer_reviews.text: If you can't do raw this mixed with Orijen is the BEST
customer_reviews.author: Amber Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my ferrets. It's very healthy for them and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: This ferret good is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This ferret good is awesome. I have 4 of them and they love it. Their bowls are empty every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Diane Pierce

customer_reviews.title: I had heard nothing but fantastic things about this brand
customer_reviews.text: I'm really upset about this. I had heard nothing but fantastic things about this brand, so when it was time to buy new food I bought this. A 20 pound bag of it. Unbeknownst to me, they changed the formula recently. My ferrets have been in severe digestive distress ever since I started feeding them this, and my floor, carpet, cage, and walls are covered in diarrhea. Now I'm out 90 dollars, and I have 20 pounds of food I cannot feed my ferrets.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR FERRETS!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing research we found this food to be number one. Our poor ferrets had terrible diarrhea, we thought it was something else because this food received such high reviews. After trying many different things, including a vet visit we looked the food up again and found that the company changed the formula.. Chia seeds, really?? In humans they are used for aid in a moving digestive system, why in the world would they be added to a pet food I will not understand. Do not give this to your precious babies.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My ferrets have lost a lot of weight with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LawP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible new formula
customer_reviews.text: My two ferrets eat a mixture of wysong and evo, this new formula is terrible. I was hoping the changes would be minimal so I gave it a try. My ferrets got horrible diarrhea and started throwing up, hoping they would get use to it I gave it a few more days. However i saw no improvement, they got worse so I had to take them to the vet. They were dehydrated from the diarrhea so they needed to be given fluid injections and they must be on four different medications for the next two weeks. They also lost some weight. I wouldn't recommend this new formula.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ferret food
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ferret food. I've been feeding this to my two boys since I got them from Petco two years ago and they have shiny soft fur, are energetic, and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: ridiculous!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying for almost a week now to get someone to respond to me so I can return this crap. My ferrets are my pride and joy, over my dead body will I feed them this new recipe of destruction. I'm apparently being ignored. My recommendation, do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: This food gave my ferrets diarrhea. I thought at ...
customer_reviews.text: This food gave my ferrets diarrhea. I thought at first that it may have just been the transition to this food from the other food we were using, but the symptoms did not subside over time. And after having problems I found a few reviews of the product which stated that other ferrets had had the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was transitioning them from Mazuri to this and when it was half and half they were fine. Now that they were getting only this
customer_reviews.text: Sadly all 3 of my fur babies are having straight diarrhea from this food. I was transitioning them from Mazuri to this and when it was half and half they were fine. Now that they were getting only this they have had horrible diarrhea for nearly 2 weeks. I just realized today it is from the food. I am hoping they are all okay. I have 1 that is older and has insulinoma and has had 2 scare episodes today where he wouldn't move and would just salivate excessively. I am hoping it's not from this food. I am now using this and Marshall's select until I can do more research on food.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets all got sick (diarrhea and vomiting) within days of ...
customer_reviews.text: Ferrets all got sick (diarrhea and vomiting) within days of introducing this food and one of them died. Have since heard that company's response to similar situations is "oh, might be quality control" and/or "we've changed the formula."
customer_reviews.author: ferrettype

customer_reviews.title: but it works great as a mix with their old food
customer_reviews.text: too high in protein for my ferrets by itself, but it works great as a mix with their old food. They loved it and had no issue adjusting to it.

The old formulation is great but this new one gives so many ferrets these issues. I'm definitely not the only one. Please return to the old formulation!

customer_reviews.text: My ferrets love to eat it and they do much better with this food than any other. They have more energy and thrive.

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the other review and avoid!!!
customer_reviews.text: This food is at the top of the Dooks Food Chart so I thought it was the best. It turns out this food formula was recently changed sometime at teh beginning of 2015. I should have listened to the other reviews; this food gave my ferrets diarrhea! I thought it was just tummy upset from a new food but after nearly a month, both of my ferrets continued to have diarrhea and drinks TONS of water equaling LOTS of litter changes. My poor babies. I have since switched over to the "digestive support" formula and they are regaining formed bowel movements.

product_meta.title: Wysong Ferret Epigen 90 - Starch Free Dry Natural Food for Ferrets
product_meta.description: Size:5 lbWysong Epigen varieties represent the first important kibble pet food innovation in almost 60 years and moves conventional dry extruded pet foods much closer to the high protein meat-based, starchless foods carnivores are genetically designed for. With that, they are given greater opportunity to enjoy their full natural health.
feature_bullets: The first extruded dry diet/kibble ferret food that is Starch Free (Epigen does what "Grain Free" pet foods only pretend to do)
Ferret Epigen 90 is a unique, nutritionally-dense pet food. When introducing for the first time be sure to follow the instructions detailed on the product label
More closely resembles the food your ferret is designed to eat. Has the natural flavor and taste that ferrets truly desire

Is replete with all the critical food elements Wysong was first to put into pet foods – probiotics, prebiotics, enzymes, phytonutrients, nutraceuticals, natural form antioxidants, vitamins and minerals. Rich in omega-3's and other essential fatty acids
Made in the USA at Wysong manufacturing facilities with ingredients from USDA and FDA approved domestic sources. Wysong has been a leader in pet nutrition since 1979
